dct_description_sm: This line data layer represents roads for Indiana in 2005. The dataset was originally published by the Indiana Department of Transportation-Management Information Systems Department on September 13, 2006.[ROADS_2005_INDOT_IN is a line shapefile of Indiana roads.The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by INDOT for the source shapefile GIS_RDS.SHP:"GIS_RDS is a polyline SDE feature class that shows Indiana roads, consisting of City Streets, County Roads and US, State and Interstate Roads, and non-certified other roads."]
dct_creator_sm: Indiana Department of Transportation-Management Information Systems Department
schema_provider_s: American Geographical Society Library â€“ UWM Libraries
